name: Easy French Toast Waffles
author: foodelicious
summary: Making French toast in your waffle iron combines the best of both worlds. You get all the custardy richness of French toast plus waffle's signature crispy ridges. All the better to hold more maple syrup.
directions: Preheat a waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions and spray with cooking spray
Whisk milk, eggs, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and salt together in a wide bowl until thoroughly combined
Dip bread slices 1 at a time in the egg mixture, coating both sides completely
Lift bread with a slotted spatula to allow excess egg mixture to drain back into the bowl
Place dipped bread slices on a rimmed baking sheet and let rest until mixture soaks in, about 2 minutes
Place dipped bread in the preheated waffle iron
Gently close the lid without forcing it down
Cook according to manufacturer's instructions until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes
